import {useState} from "react"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import CommonSection from "../components/UI/common-section/CommonSection"; import products from "../assets/product-data/products"; import {Container, Row, Col} from "reactstrap"; import "../styles/food-details.css" import {isAction} from "@reduxjs/toolkit"; const FoodDetails = () => { const [tab, setTab] = useState('desc'); //продукты по категориям const {id} = useParams(); const product = products.find(product => product.id === id); const [parent, setParent] = useState(product.image01); return ( <>
setParent(product.image01)}>
setParent(product.image02)}>
setParent(product.image03)}>

{product.title}

Стоимость: {product.price}₽

Категории: {product.category1}

{ setTab('desc') }}>Описание
{ setTab('rev') }}>Комментарий
{ tab === 'desc' ?

{product.desc}

:
